title: Best of Design Matters: Richard Saul Wurman
description: Making information understandable both for himself and others—TED founder and author of numerous books, Richard Saul Wurman, joins to talk about education.
itunes:subtitle: Making information understandable both for himself and others—TED founder and author of over 90 books, Richard Saul Wurman, joins to talk about education.
